description.de:
Niemand in Oliva Florence’ Leben — einschließlich ihres eigenen Ehemanns — gab ihr die Wärme, nach die sie sich immer sehnte, weswegen sie ihr Leben allein lebte und dadurch zu einer starken, unabhängigen Frau wurde. Als sie eines Morgens, zwei Jahrzehnte vor Beginn ihrer arrangierten und unglücklichen Ehe mit dem Herzog Herr James Parnell, aufwacht und realisiert, dass sie in der Zeit zurückgereist ist, beschließt sie, ihr Leben radikal umzukremplen. Sie heckt einen Plan aus, um ihre Ehe zu annullieren und stattdessen den Herzog Ian Tyrone zu heiraten, der aufgrund seines bekannten Desinteresses an Frauen als *impotent* gilt. Vielleicht würde jenes Desinteresse an Frauen Olivia ein entspanntes Leben als Ehefrau ermöglichen, ohne den Druck, Kinder kriegen oder andere Dinge tun zu müssen. Zumindest erhofft sie sich das. Doch Moment… Der Herzog, der dafür bekannt sein soll, „keinen hochzukriegen,“ entpuppt sich im Schlafzimmer als absoluter Hengst. Worauf hat sich Olivia da bloß eingelassen?

---

description.en:
Not a single soul in Olivia Florence's life, including her own husband, provided the warmth that she craved, and she lived her life alone, growing strong. Waking up two decades earlier right after her regretful arranged marriage to the Duke, Lord James Parnell, she plans to live a different life.

She hatches a plan to annul her marriage remarry the Duke, Ian Tyrone, infamous for being *impotent* for never showing any interest in the ladies. Maybe his disinterest in women would allow Olivia to comfortably live as his wife, unburdened by childbirth and free of any other pressures in life.

But wait, the Duke who seemingly "couldn't get it up" turns out to be a complete stud at in the bedroom. What has Olivia gotten herself into?

---
Olivia, celebrating her second chance at life, decides to get away from her first husband, who has high libido. So she proposed marriage to Duke Tyrone, who is known for his incompetence, but when I got married, this man was a skillful man and totally not defective.

"This is fraud! This marriage is a fraud!"

Olivia, who is now depressed because of her desperate second husband putting moves on her, will she be happy in her second life?

---

description.fr:
Pas une seule âme dans la vie d'Olivia Florence, y compris son propre mari, ne lui a procuré le bien-être dont elle avai besion, et elle a vécu sa vie seule, en devenant de plus en plus forte chaque jour. Se réveillant deux décennies plus tôt, tout juste après son regrettable mariage arrangé avec le duc, Seigneur James Parnell, elle projette de vivre une vie différente. Elle élabore un plan pour annuler son mariage et se remarier avec un autre duc, Ian Tyrone, tristement célèbre pour être «*impussant*» et n'avoir jamais montré le moindre intérêt pour les femmes. Peut-être que cette indifférence permettrait à Olivia de vivre confortablement en tant qu’épouse, sans être accablée par les grossesses et libre de toute autre pression dans la vie. Out mais, le duc qui apparemment «ne pouvait pas avoir d'érection» s'avère être un vrai étalon au lit. Dans quoi Oliva s'est-elle embarquée?

---

description.ja:
「不能男と聞いていたのに…？」
人生2回目を迎えた主人公オリビア。 今生は、代理親孝行に嫁入り暮らしをさせながら、性欲まで旺盛な夫から抜け出すことを決心する。 
そして不能と噂されているタイロン公爵に結婚を提案したが、結婚してみるとこの男、不能どころかとても上手な絶倫男だった……!!
「これは詐欺よ、私は結婚詐欺にあったの！」
2番目の絶倫夫に今日も憂鬱なオリビア。果たして2回目の人生では幸せになれるだろうか。

---

description.ko:
'대국민 고자라더니…?!'

인생 2회차를 맞은 주인공 올리비아.
이번 생엔 대리 효도에 시집살이를 시키면서 성욕까지 왕성한 남편에게서 벗어나기로 마음 먹는다.
그래서 불능으로 소문난 타이론 공작에게 결혼을 제안했는데,
결혼하고 보니 이 남자, 대국민 고자는 커녕 세상 능숙한 절륜남이었다…! 

'이건 사기야, 난 사기 결혼을 당한 거라고!' 

절륜한 두 번째 남편 때문에 오늘도 우울한 올리비아, 2회차 인생에서는 과연 행복해질 수 있을까?

---

description.ru:
Сегодня мне исполнилось 40 лет. После дня, как я готовилась по случаю дня рождения, я легла спать, но на следующий день проснулась молодой и в старой коморке. Услышав оскорбления от свекрови и ее сестер, только тогда я поняла, что я вернулась на двадцать лет назад. Чтобы не прожить свою жизнь, как и раньше, где я не видела и лица своего первого мужа. Чтобы все самые лучшие годы жизни не улетели в мусорное ведро, я решила изменить свою жизнь и выйти замуж за герцога Яна Терона.

---

description.vi:
Olivia đã sống một cuộc đời bất hạnh với người chồng lạnh nhạt và 3 bà mẹ chồng cay nghiệt. Tỉnh lại sau một đêm, Olivia nhận ra mình đã quay về tuổi 20, khi cô vừa về nhà người chồng đầu tiên và vẫn còn có thể vô hiệu hóa cuộc hôn nhân này. Olivia quyết tâm sẽ không cam chịu nhẫn nhục và chôn vùi cuộc đời mình ở chốn địa ngục kia như kiếp trước nữa. Cô cầu hôn Công tước Tyron với quyết tâm bắt đầu một cuộc đời mới. Công tước Tyron vừa giàu có vừa đẹp trai nhưng lại nổi tiếng khắp đế quốc với tin đồn bị "bất lực". Liệu người chồng thứ hai này có đem lại hạnh phúc như Olivia mong muốn không?

description.pt-br:
Hoje é meu 40º aniversário. Depois das empregadas organizarem a festa, eu acordei depois de dormir demais e minha falecida sogra gritou comigo. “Sou vadia preguiçosa!” E minha segunda e terceira sogras foram brigar e um marido que nunca vi na vida. Aí percebi que tinha voltado aos meus 20 anos. Minha segunda vida tinha começado.

「明明聽說他是國民性無能…？」
來到第二次人生的主角奧莉薇亞，今世決定要逃離小媳婦的盡孝婆家生活，擺脫性慾旺盛的丈夫掌控。
她因此向傳說是性無能的泰伊倫公爵提議結婚，成婚後才驚覺這男人根本不是不舉，反而是技巧高超，很在行的男人……!!
「這絕對是詐欺吧！我被騙結婚了！」
面對第二任的高超丈夫，奧莉薇亞每天都很憂鬱，今天也不例外。
到底這樣的人生能幸福嗎？

altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.vi: Kuroto Nakano là một nhân viên văn phòng trẻ tuổi có cuộc sống vô cùng bận rộn và căng thẳng, gần như dành toàn bộ thời gian trong ngày ở công ti. Một đêm nọ, sau ngày dài làm việc quá sức, anh mở cửa nhà và thấy một cô gái với tai và đuôi cáo đang nấu cơm trong bếp. Tên cô là Senko, một hồ li 800 tuổi. Senko đã từ thế giới tâm linh hạ phàm để giúp Nakano xua tan căng thẳng và tìm lại hạnh phúc.
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

title.en: His Majesty Doesn't Want to Be Too Bossy

altTitles.th: บัลลังก์บุปผา

description.en: Like a mascot, this "Emperor" is a woman disguised as a man. The black-hearted Prince Regent has been "taking good care" of her since she was a child. Countless treacherous officials are blocking her way to taking over the throne upon her coming of age. However, if you can't beat that person, then there's always the option of bringing him home to marry!
description.es: Ella es la mascota del Príncipe Regente, es el "Emperador" vestida de hombre. El Regente de corazón negro ha "cuidado bien" de ella desde que era una niña. ¡Pero si no puede vencer a su rival, puede casarse con él!

altTitles.ja: うしろの正面カムイさん

altTitles.en: Kamui, the One Standing Behind You

altTitles.th: คุณคามุยลุยหลังผี

description.en: Shizuka is a normal high school girl with the ability to see ghosts. Due to her peculiar tendency to attract ghosts, she works as an assistant to Kamui, a famous psychic. Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!
description.id: Shizuka adalah anak SMA biasa yang bisa melihat makhluk halus. Dia bekerja sebagai asisten dukun terkenal bernama Kamui-san. Teknik mengusir hantu Kamui-san itu agak… unik.
description.ja:
「幽霊が見えるだけ」の普通の女子高生・シヅカ。シヅカは幽霊を引き寄せる特異体質を活かし、有名な霊能力者・カムイの助手として働いている。圧倒的な霊力を誇るカムイだが、その除霊は前代未聞なヤリ方でーーー!?

“超”除霊の幕が開く!! エッッッッッッッッッッロイムエッサイム!!
description.ru: Шизука обычная школьница, которая может видеть призраков. Она работает помощницей известного экзорциста по имени Камуи-сан, правда техника экзорцизма Камуи-сана ........ необычная.
description.zh: 只是能看见幽灵而已”的普通JK耳塚志津香，在超有名超变态的除灵师神威事务所蹭饭吃之余，一同合作除灵的喜剧故事。
description.es-la:
Shizuka es una chica normal de instituto que sólo puede ver fantasmas.
Trabaja como asistente de Kamui, un famoso vidente que tiene una constitución única que atrae a los fantasmas.
Kamui está orgulloso de su abrumador poder psíquico, ¡pero la forma en que elimina los fantasmas es inaudita!
description.pt-br: Shizuka é uma garota comum do ensino médio que consegue enxergar fantasmas, ela trabalha como assistente do famoso médium Kamui-san, aproveitando a característica única dela de poder ver fantasmas. Kamui possui um poder espiritual avassalador, mas seu exorcismo é um pouco diferente do normal.

altTitles.id: ดาบพิฆาตอสูร เล่ม

description.en:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  
  
MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>
description.ru: Танджиро - старший сын в семье, потерявшей кормильца. Однажды он уходит в другой город, чтобы продать древесный уголь, но в конце концов остаётся на ночь в чужом доме, вместо того, чтобы идти домой. А всё из-за слухов о демоне, который разгуливает в горах под покровом темноты. Утром парень вернётся домой живым и невредимым… Но его ждут ужасные известия.
description.vi: Thanh Gươm Diệt Quỷ còn có tên gọi khác là Lưỡi Gươm Diệt Quỷ hay Yaiba Kimetsu. Phim Thanh Gươm Diệt Quỷ: Kimetsu No Yaiba. Vào thời xa xưa, có một truyền thuyết về những con quỷ ăn thịt người luôn lãng vãng trong cánh rừng sâu. Vì điều này, người dân trong làng không bao giờ đi ra ngoài vào trời tối. Truyền thuyến cũng kể rằng có một Sát Quỷ Nhân luôn xuất hiện vào ban đêm để tiêu diệt những con quỷ khát máu này. Đối với chàng trai trẻ Tanjiro, câu chuyện dân gian ấy đã trở thành hiện thực cay đắng mà cậu phải hứng chịu...Sau khi cha cậu qua đời, Tanjiro luôn cố gắng hết sức để trở thành trụ cột trong gia đình. Dù cuộc sống vất vả, cực khổ, những gia đình của cậu vẫn luôn ngập tràn hạnh phúc. Nhưng niềm hạnh phúc ấy cũng không kéo dài lâu được. Một ngày nọ, khi Tanjiro trở về, cậu phát hiện gia đình mình đã bị sát hại dã man, và chỉ có một người duy nhất sống sót, đó là em gái Nezuko của cậu. Nhưng bi kịch thay, Nezuko đã trở thành con quỷ đáng sợ. Tuy nhiên, cô vẫn còn giữ một chút nhân tính. Đó là thời điểm bắt đầu cuộc chiến đơn độc của Tanjiro, tiêu diệt quỷ và tìm cách biến em gái mình trở lại làm người.

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด ฝ่า 48 วันโลกวิกฤต

description.en: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.

As the son of King Yeom-ra of the underworld, Jae-shin has lived a hedonistic life full of ever-changing bed partners and condescension towards humans. One day, however, he crosses a line and is given a rather unusual punishment: by day, he becomes a powerless puppy, and by night, he becomes a human. The only way to escape his punishment is to win over a human’s heart, which won’t be easy…especially when the human he sets his eyes on is sweet-natured prince Lee Nok. Will Jae-shin win over the prince? Or will Jae-shin be the one who is won over?
description.pl: Jako syn króla Yeomra z podziemnego świata, Jaeshin prowadził hedonistyczne życie pełne ciągle zmieniających się partnerów łóżkowych i protekcjonalności wobec ludzi. Pewnego dnia jednak przekracza granicę i zostaje ukarany w dość nietypowy sposób: w dzień staje się bezsilnym szczeniakiem, a w nocy człowiekiem. Jedynym sposobem na uniknięcie kary jest zdobycie ludzkiego serca, co nie będzie łatwe... zwłaszcza, gdy człowiekiem, na którego zwrócił uwagę, jest słodki książę Lee Nok. Czy Jaeshin zdobędzie księcia? A może to Jaeshin zostanie zdobyty?
description.uk: Ча Шин, котрий був вигнаним з власного світу за вчинення злочину, котрий порушив порядок життя та смерті. Його єдиний спосіб повернутись назад в підземний світ - завоювати людське серце. Перед Ча Шином, який не вірить у людську великодушність, постає спадкоємний принц Нок, у котрого розбите серце через невзаємне кохання. Демон починає цікавитись Ноком... Цікавий початок... Що ж буде далі?
description.es-la: Jae-shin, quien se convirtió en un criminal y fue expulsado de este mundo. Su única forma de regresar al inframundo es obteniendo un corazón humano. Frente a Jae-shin, que no cree en las emociones humanas, aparece el príncipe heredero Nok, que tiene un problema del corazón desde hace mucho tiempo, Jae-shin comienza a sentir curiosidad por la situación de Nok. "Hay un idiota que alberga un amor que no se puede cumplir.”

title.en: Hunting in Another World With My Elf Wife

altTitles.ja: 北海道の現役ハンターが異世界に放り込まれてみた 〜エルフ嫁と巡る異世界狩猟ライフ〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Hokkaidou no Gen'eki Hunter ga Isekai ni Hourikomarete Mita ~Elf Yome to Meguru Isekai Shuryou Life~

altTitles.en: An Active Hokkaidouan Hunter Is Thrown Into Another World ~A Life Of Hunting Around Another World With An Elf Wife~
An Active Hunter in Hokkaido Has Been Thrown Into a Different World

altTitles.pt-br: Caçando em Outro Mundo com Minha Esposa Elfa

altTitles.zh: 北海道的现役猎人被丢到异世界

description.en:
In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school, so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world, armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died.
___
**Character Designer:** [Yuunagi](https://mangadex.org/author/58f536f6-3ede-40cc-8b41-82efb77d1919)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48586)
description.ja: 北海道で猟師をしている中島進は凶暴なヒグマから子供を助け命を落としてしまう。しかし目が覚めるとそこは異世界。無線からは女神を名乗る女性の声が…
description.pt-br: Um urso marrom apareceu perto de uma escola primária, então um membro da associação de caçadores local é enviado para exterminá-lo. No entanto, ele é morto pelo urso e acorda em um mundo de fantasia, armado apenas com a espingarda Remington M870 que tinha quando morreu.

description.en: A collection of the best stories illustrated by Amagappa Shoujogun, a rising star in the world of horror manga.
description.ja: ホラー漫画界の新星・雨がっぱ少女群が描く、至極の短編集。
description.ru: Cборник лучших рассказов, нарисованных Amagappa Shoujogun, восходящей звездой в мире хоррор-манги.

altTitles.en: The Diary of a S-Class Spirit Master

description.en:
In a world where wars were fought with swords and magic, and the only transportation was by horse-drawn carriage…

There, I lived as a spirit master—and died. But then…

I was reborn?!

In this new life, there were hunters and monsters, just like in my previous one. But here, the concept of spirits didn’t exist at all.

"Jackpot!"

Monsters? Dungeons? That’s the hunters’ problem, right? All I want is the simple, ordinary life I’ve always dreamed of!

But, as they say, misfortune strikes when you least expect it.

In a not-so-coincidental coincidence, I touched a mysterious egg in a dungeon, and at that moment…

"Congratulations! You have awakened, Miss Yuina!"

I had awakened as an S-Class Spirit Master?!

With Iz, the mischievous spirit of water!
Rika, the playful spirit of wind!
And me, Yuina, the S-Class Spirit Master who has lost all hope of an ordinary life!

An S-Class Spirit Master's desperate journey to reclaim her peaceful life!
"Just give me back my normal life!"

Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽
___
**Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.
description.vi: Anh chủ tiệm xiên nướng đã phải lòng một cô bunny girl khách hàng của ảnh! Làm sao để có thể tiếp cận cô ấy cho dù anh lúc nào cũng túi bụi với cửa tiệm đây?
description.pt-br: Cinco garotas bonitas em trajes de coelho visitam uma churrascaria todas as noites, encantando o cozinheiro. O dono se sente atraído por uma delas, mas não há muitas abordagens possíveis para ele fazer, pois não pode sair da cozinha. Este mangá retrata a história de amor saudável de um dono de restaurante.

title.en: My Hero Academia - Rondo of Opalus (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Inspired by the fantasy AU illustrations.
Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください! 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

description.en: Ooyama-kun normally doesn't get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san's sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space... he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn't?
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja: 普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!?
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

title.en: Kanojo no Tomodachi Uwaki Selection Full Color

altTitles.vi: Bạn Của Bạn Gái Tôi - Tuyển tập các phân cảnh ngoại tình được lên màu

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達　うわきセレクション　フルカラ

description.vi: Tuyển tập các phân cảnh ngoại tình được lên màu trong phần chính truyện.

description.en: Due to the school bully's threat to get him game items, Ha Do-wan, the unlucky game shuttle, died after playing games all night long for a week. The moment he died, he got respawned to the classroom one week before he died... Everything is the same as that day. The only thing that has changed is the floating in front of him! What? Use the skills of the games I've played so far to beat the bully?!?!
description.fr: À cause de la menace des harceleurs de son école qui l'obligent à gagner des objets dans un jeu, Ha Do-Wan, le malheureux joueur à tout faire, est mort après avoir joué sans arrêt pendant une semaine. Au moment où il est mort, il s'est fait réincarner dans sa salle de classe une semaine avant sa mort... Tout est comme ce jour-là. La seule chose qui a changé est cette fenêtre volante devant lui ! Quoi ? Utiliser les skills que j'ai utilisé dans tous les jeux auxquels j'ai pu jouer jusqu'ici pour battre les harceleurs ?!?!
description.ru: После угроз и запугиваний школьного хулигана, который требовал добыть предметы, Ха До Ван всю неделю проводит ночи напролет за играми, умирает и перерождается в школьном кабинете за неделю до этого... Все было точно таким же, как в тот день. Изменилось только одно - это "Оповещение о квесте", которое всплыло перед глазами! Что? От меня требуется победить этого хулигана, используя все мои игровые навыки?
description.pt-br: Após ser forçado pelo valentão da escola a dropar um item lendário, Ha Dowan, o escravo gamer, morre depois de passar a sete dias seguidos jogando. No momento de sua morte, ele renasce na sala de aula, uma semana antes do dia em que morreu. Tudo está exatamente igual àquele dia. A única coisa diferente é que a <notificação de missão> está flutuando na frente dele! “O quê? tenho que usar as habilidades de todos os jogos que joguei até hoje pra descer o cacete nesse desgraçado?!”

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.vi: Tổ đội anh hùng đã đánh bại được quỷ vương và kết thúc cuộc hành trình của họ. Nhưng thế chưa phải là hết, cuộc đời của cô nàng pháp sư Elf này sẽ còn rất dài, hơn cả những người đồng đội cũ của cô, một cuộc phiêu lưu mới để cô trải qua nhiều cung bậc cảm xúc, cũng như là học hỏi thêm về con người.
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.ja: 渚ちゃんの大きな大きなかくしごと

altTitles.ja-ro: Nagisa-chan no Ooki na Ooki na Kakushigoto

altTitles.es-la: El gran gran Secreto de Nagisa-chan

altTitles.vi: Bí mật to bự của Nagisa-chan

description.en:
Nagisa-chan has a crush on her childhood friend. One day, she suddenly starts growing to a giant size!
In order to return to normal, she needs to "be able to say what she really feels," but...
The romantic comedy with the largest height difference begins now!!

altTitles.th: วัยซนคนมีพลังจิต

description.en: Young Mikan runs away to Tokyo to follow her best friend, Hotaru, who has been enrolled in an exclusive, secretive private school for geniuses. But it turns out that Alice Academy is a lot more than meets the eye. If Mikan wants to stay by Hotaru's side, she has to both pass the strange "entrance exam" and face the even greater challenge of befriending her very odd new classmates. Whether it's Hotaru's gift for inventing gadgets, the cranky Natsume's fire-casting ability, or Professor Narumi's control of human pheromones, everyone at the school has some sort of special talent. But what ability, if any, does Mikan possess? Mikan is going to have to rely on her courage and spunk if she's going to stay in school, or even stay alive!
description.pl: Mikan Sakura dorastała u swojego dziadka na wsi w Japonii. Pewnego dnia jej najlepsza przyjaciółka, Hotaru, oświadczyła, że przeniosi się do prestiżowej szkoły w Tokio. Mikan jako jej oddana przyjaciółka bez namysłu za nią podążyła. Szkoła ta jest tak naprawdę elitarną Akademią dla ludzi obdarowanych indywidualną mocą „Alice”. Lecz czy całkiem zwykła Mikan jest w stanie dostać się do tak elitarnej szkoły? Przekonajcie się sami!

altTitles.ja: 杖と剣のウィストリア

altTitles.vi: Bản Hùng ca Kiếm và Pháp Trượng

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

title.en: Okane de Ai wa Kaemasuka? Futsuu OL ga Josei Fuuzoku ni Numatte Yamiochi Shimashita

altTitles.ja: お金で愛は買えますか？　普通OLが女性風俗に沼って闇堕ちしました

altTitles.en: Can Money Buy Love? An Ordinary Office Lady Lured into Adult Female Entertainment Sank into Darkness.

description.en:
Second virgin went to Women's Wind and fell madly in love!

Office worker Berry happened to learn about the dating course at Onna Kaze through an Internet TV program she was watching, and out of curiosity, she decided to try it out.
After using the course several times, she becomes attracted to KEN, the therapist, and with a single-minded desire to get closer to KEN, she finally uses the treatment course and becomes physically and emotionally addicted to KEN.
What will happen to Berry's love, swamped by the person she has to pay to see?

After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].
**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

title.en: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago

altTitles.en: Drops of Dreams, the Golden Birdcage

altTitles.vi: Tàn dư mộng ước, Lồng chim hoàng kim

description.en:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. 
When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her 
and promised to give her true freedom. 
He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. 
Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. 
But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend… Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! 
What does freedom mean when you are in another man’s harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? 
Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages… 
but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. 
So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman’s son. 
However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.  
  
Hence begins the story of a slave to an empress of the greatest empire of all time – 
Alexandra, the woman who would one day be known as Roxelana, Empress of the Ottoman Empire.
description.vi: Tác phẩm “Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago" kể về câu chuyện của Alexandra, một cô gái trẻ sống tại Ruthenia bị bắt cóc bởi quân Tatar và được bán làm nô lệ cho Đế quốc Ottoman. Alexandra sau đó được đưa vào hậu cung của Sultan Suleiman I và đổi tên thành Hurrem. Hurrem trở thành một trong những phi tần được sủng ái nhất của Sultan Suleiman I và sau đó trở thành Haseki Sultan, một trong những nhân vật quyền lực nhất trong hậu cung.

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

description.en:
“I don't mind being eaten – as long as you stay here forever.”

Shirota - who lives alone in a village that never has spring - meets Heidi - an injured wolf beast and three wolf children accompanying him on a blizzard day. His village's rules were to absolutely not go near beastmen, but he couldn't leave the injured person alone in the storm, so he invited the wolf into his house until his wound healed.

A few days prior, mysterious disappearances had occurred in a certain karaoke parlor. There, part-timer Aoki Tokiya was involved in an even stranger incident. On the other hand, Midorima, who is investigating the incident, could not seem to pinpoint the target’s true identity.
description.ja: 想いが象（かたち）になるとき、世界が開かれる！九十九師VS妖怪、開戦！失踪事件が起こったカラオケ店。そこでバイトする青木時也はさらなる奇怪な事件に巻きこまれていく。事件の調査にやってきた九十九師・緑間の導きで九十九師となった時也は、緑間とともに物ノ怪と応戦する。だが、100人目の九十九師の誕生は九十九師全員のパワーバランスを崩し、時也は「禁忌の存在」として命を狙われてしまう！

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

San attends the most elite female school in Okinawa, but she and her classmates are recruited as nurse aides for the Japanese army during World War II. As the battle on Okinawa intensifies, San and her classmates come face to face with the horrors of war.

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
“Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted.”

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to “clear the game” in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ko: 그 악녀 인생, 제가 한번 살아 볼게요

I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

altTitles.es-la: Viviré Esta Reencarnación Como La Villana

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

description.en:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
description.vi: Dễ thương tương đương bất khả chiến bại! Quái nhân Mira lại tác oai tác quái hòng chiếm đoạt đai biến hình của người hùng. Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

description.en: "You're my fiancée, so it's only natural that we do this tonight." He kisses me deeply and devours my whole body… My first sweet kiss on my first night of reincarnation.
description.ru: Офисная работница умирает от переутомления и перевоплощается в злодейку в своей любимой отомэ-игре. Сможет ли она сохранить своего жениха или проиграет его главной героине?
description.zh-hk: 工作压力超大、靠玩乙女游戏减压的社畜，竟然因为过劳死转生到了自己所玩的游戏世界里面。自己扮演的角色竟然是——恶役啊？

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
